List of player-characters

Diamond Wing

Mercenary with rare genetic condition that gives him a crystalline structure coating his wings

a Chozo played by Jacob

Tak

Middle-managing slightly-illegal merchant

an Aandrisk played by Ethan

Blue Tsukino

Dashing freedom-seeking space-pirate

a Human played by Brandon

Ystra

Ex-slave, very... self-determined

a Lura played by Jamie

Nova

Diamond's fellow mercenary

a Zoltan played by Callum
